messages.title: My Priorities For Lancaster and Fleetwood

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver Brexit, no ifs or buts - then we can get on with securing a better, brighter future for you, your family and for Lancaster and Fleetwood.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: OUR NHS, EDUCATION AND LIVING STANDARDS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will work to protect our precious NHS; to ensure everyone has access to affordable housing and that our young people are given the education and skills they need. I am backing the 3.9% increase in the State Pension for 13 million, and I welcome the £34m boost for the Royal Lancaster Infirmary.
I will support our vital agricultural industry; work to make sure our rural communities are well-connected; help tackle social isolation and ensure we get extra police officers in the constituency.

examples: I am backing the 3.9% increase in the State Pension for 13 million, and I welcome the £34m boost for the Royal Lancaster Infirmary.
Deliver Brexit, no ifs or buts - then we can get on with securing a better, brighter future for you, your family and for Lancaster and Fleetwood.
I will work to protect our precious NHS; to ensure everyone has access to affordable housing and that our young people are given the education and skills they need.
I will support our vital agricultural industry; work to make sure our rural communities are well-connected; help tackle social isolation and ensure we get extra police officers in the constituency.
My Priorities For Lancaster and Fleetwood
I will support our vital agricultural industry; work to make sure our rural communities are well-connected; help tackle social isolation and ensure we get extra police officers in the constituency.
I welcome the £34m boost for the Royal Lancaster Infirmary.
Deliver Brexit, no ifs or buts - then we can get on with securing a better, brighter future for you, your family and for Lancaster and Fleetwood.
I am backing the 3.9% increase in the State Pension for 13 million.
